Package org.garret.perst

Class StorageListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.garret.perst.StorageListener
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    QueryProfiler

    public abstract class StorageListener
extends java.lang.Object
    Listener of database events. Programmer should derive his own subclass and register it using Storage.setListener method.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StorageListener()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void databaseCorrupted()
      This metod is called during database open when database was not close normally and has to be recovered
      void deallocateObject(java.lang.Class cls, int oid)
      This method is called when unreferenced object is deallocated from database during garbage collection.

      This method is called when garbage collection is completed
      void gcStarted()
      This method is called when garbage collection is started (ether explicitly by invocation of Storage.gc() method, either implicitly after allocation of some amount of memory)).

      Index is automaticaslly created by Database class when query is executed and autoIndices is anabled

        public StorageListener()

    • Method Detail

      • databaseCorrupted

        public void databaseCorrupted()
        This metod is called during database open when database was not close normally and has to be recovered

      • deallocateObject

        public void deallocateObject(java.lang.Class cls,
                             int oid)
        This method is called when unreferenced object is deallocated from database during garbage collection. It is possible to get instance of the object using Storage.getObjectByOid() method.
        Parameters:
        cls - class of deallocated object
        oid - object identifier of deallocated object

      • gcCompleted

        public void gcCompleted(int nDeallocatedObjects)
        This method is called when garbage collection is completed
        Parameters:
        nDeallocatedObjects - number of deallocated objects

      • gcStarted

        public void gcStarted()
        This method is called when garbage collection is started (ether explicitly by invocation of Storage.gc() method, either implicitly after allocation of some amount of memory)).

      • indexCreated

        public void indexCreated(java.lang.Class table,
                         java.lang.String field)
        Index is automaticaslly created by Database class when query is executed and autoIndices is anabled
        Parameters:
        table - table for which index is created
        field - index key

      • JSQLRuntimeError

        public void JSQLRuntimeError(JSQLRuntimeException x)
        This method is called when runtime error happen during execution of JSQL query

      • objectNotExported

        public boolean objectNotExported(int oid,
                                 StorageError x)
        This method is called by XML exporter if database correuption or some other reasons makes export of the object not possible
        Parameters:
        oid - object identified
        x - catched exception
        Returns:
        true to ignore error and continue export, false to cancel export and rethrow exception

      • onMasterDatabaseUpdate

        public void onMasterDatabaseUpdate()
        Method invoked by Perst when slave node receive updates from master

      • onObjectAssignOid

        public void onObjectAssignOid(java.lang.Object obj)
        Method invoked by Perst after object is assigned OID (becomes persisistent)
        Parameters:
        obj - object which is made persistent

      • onObjectDelete

        public void onObjectDelete(java.lang.Object obj)
        Method invoked by Perst before object is deallocated
        Parameters:
        obj - deallocated object

      • onObjectLoad

        public void onObjectLoad(java.lang.Object obj)
        Method invoked by Perst affter object is loaded from the database
        Parameters:
        obj - loaded object

      • onObjectStore

        public void onObjectStore(java.lang.Object obj)
        Method invoked by Perst before object is written to the database
        Parameters:
        obj - stored object

      • onTransactionCommit

        public void onTransactionCommit()
        Method invoked by Perst when transaction is committed

      • onTransactionRollback

        public void onTransactionRollback()
        Method invoked by Perst when transaction is aborted

      • onXmlExportError

        public boolean onXmlExportError(int oid,
                                java.lang.Exception x)
        This method is called by XMLExporter when exception happens during object export. Exception can be caused either by IO problems (failed to write data to the destination stream) either by corruption of object.
        Parameters:
        oid - object identifier of exported object
        x - catched exception
        Returns:
        true if error should be ignored and export continued, false to rethrow catched exception

      • queryExecution

        public void queryExecution(java.lang.Class table,
                           java.lang.String query,
                           long elapsedTime,
                           boolean sequentialSearch)
        This method is called when query is executed
        Parameters:
        table - table in which search is perfomed.
        query - executed query
        elapsedTime - time in milliseconds of query execution (please notice that many queries are executed incrementally, so the time passed to this method is not always complete time of query execution
        sequentialSearch - true if sequential scan in used for query execution, false if some index is used

      • recoveryCompleted

        public void recoveryCompleted()
        This method is called after completion of recovery

      • replicationError

        public boolean replicationError(java.lang.String host)
        Handle replication error
        Parameters:
        host - address of host replication to which is failed (null if error jappens at slave node)
        Returns:
        true if host should be reconnected and attempt to send data to it should be repeated, false if no more attmpts to communicate with this host should be performed

      • sequentialSearchPerformed

        public void sequentialSearchPerformed(java.lang.Class table,
                                      java.lang.String query)
        Sequential search is performed for query execution
        Parameters:
        table - table in which sequential search is perfomed.
        query - executed query

      • sortResultSetPerformed

        public void sortResultSetPerformed(java.lang.Class table,
                                   java.lang.String query)
        Sort of the selected result set is performed for query execution
        Parameters:
        table - table in which sort is perfomed.
        query - executed query
